81-1922.Intern licenses; fees; expiration.

The fee for all intern licenses shall be fifteen dollars. The license shall expire twelve months following its issuance. The secretary may renew or extend an intern's license upon a showing of good cause for any period not to exceed six months for a fee of fifteen dollars. The secretary shall remit the fees received pursuant to this section to the State Treasurer for credit to the Secretary of State Cash Fund.

SourceLaws 1980, LB 485, ยง 22;Laws 1982, LB 928, ยง 74;Laws 2020, LB910, ยง 34.
